channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Bard/The Charmer (Blue Dragon/Unseen Offensive)
channel.description:
The Bard - Blue Dragon Offensive
Passive: Charismatic If the Bard is voted up for treason, he will reveal himself as the Bard and talk his way out of the trial. He can't be re-voted for the day. 1 use.
Night Ability 1: Angelic Tune Chosen target will be pacified, occupying them if they tried to kill. You **will not** know if they were occupied. Infinite uses.
Night Ability 2: Song of Silence Chosen target can't speak or vote the next day, and they don't influence the number of votes required to go to trial. 1 use.
(Converted from Bard) The Charmer - Unseen Offensive
Night Ability 1: Charm Chosen target will be occupied if they are an Investigator. You **will** know if they were occupied. Infinite uses.
Night Ability 2: Peaceful Resolution Anyone who tries to kill a member of the Unseen will be occupied, ignoring immunity. (This includes Prince, or is that too op?) You **won't** know who visited, but you **will** know if someone was occupied for visiting. 1 use.
